title: Aditya Diamond Haaram with Emerald & Ruby Accents
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases intricate floral motifs meticulously crafted in a pave setting with brilliant-cut diamonds. A regal central pendant features an oval-cut emerald, radiating opulence. A smaller, teardrop ruby provides a vibrant contrast, embodying the richness of South Indian heritage. The lower pendant is gracefully adorned with delicate pearl drops, known as 'gundla'.
colors: with pops of deep green (emerald) and rich red (ruby). The pearl adds a soft
elegant touch. A classic tricolor combination considered auspicious in Telugu culture.
occasions: and grand festive occasions. An ideal choice for muhurtham (ముహూర్తం) ceremonies or any event where you want to make a statement.
description: This Diamond Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and masterful craftsmanship. The combination of vibrant gemstones and dazzling diamonds makes it a truly exceptional piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, while the classic design guarantees it will be cherished for generations. It's not just jewelry, it's an heirloom.
